mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_count, is_xiaohao, goods_jpg_url, goods_location, goods_type, size) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isXiaohao,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsJpgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_xiaohao = #{isXiaohao,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_jpg_url = #{goodsJpgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_location = #{goodsLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, goods_count, is_xiaohao, goods_jpg_url, goods_location, goods_type, size from goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goods_id, goods_name, goods_count, is_xiaohao, goods_jpg_url, goods_location, goods_type, size from goods
